Trade/Device Name(s): Coag-Sense Prothrombin Time (PT) / INR Monitoring System for Patient Self-Testing
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Coag-Sense Prothrombin Time (PT) / INR Monitoring System meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Coag-Sense Prothrombin Time (PT) / INR Monitoring System for Patient Self-Testing, a handheld device for quantitative PT/INR measurement from fingerstick whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Provides quantitative PT results in INR units from fresh capillary whole blood for patient self-testing to monitor anticoagulation therapy on physician's order; not for screening and intended for single person use
